Home

Produce a morning briefing of everything that needs attention across the user's repositories.

Same as @daily-briefing but as a one-shot prompt invocation. Use this structure:

## Morning Briefing — [today's date]

### Action Required

#### Pull Requests Waiting for Your Review
[Each: title, #number, repository, author, N days waiting]

#### @Mentions Awaiting Response
[Each: issue/PR title, #number, repository, who mentioned you]

#### CI Failures on Your Branches
[Each: branch, repository, which check failed]

### For Your Awareness

#### Issues Opened Since Yesterday
[Each: title, #number, repository, labels]

#### Your PRs With New Activity
[Each: title, #number, what changed]

### All Clear
[List each checked category that has no items — do not omit these lines]

Cover repositories from the user's preferences file (.github/agents/preferences.md) if available. Report "None" explicitly for every empty section — never skip a section. Use UTC unless the user's preferences file specifies a time zone.
